```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
data("ny_noaa")
```

```{r}
ny_noaa_df = ny_noaa |>
  filter(!is.na(date),
         !is.na(tmax),
         !is.na(tmin)) |>
  mutate(year = year(date),
         month = month(date),
         day = day(date)) |>
  mutate(tmin = as.numeric(tmin) / 10,
         tmax = as.numeric(tmax) / 10)
```
